sourcesContent: import React, { Components, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios'; import moment from 'moment'; const Form = () =>{ const [user, setUser] = useState({ examId :" ", name:" ", grade :" ", subject:" ",date :" ", timeStart:" ", timeEnd :" ", notice:" " }); let name,value; const handleInput = (e) => { console.log(e); name = e.target.name; value = e.target.value; setUser({...user,[name]:value}); } const PostData =async(e) =>{ e.preventDefault(); const { examId, name, grade, subject, date, timeStart, timeEnd, notice } =user; const res = await fetch("/add",{ method:"POST", headers:{ } }) } return (
